title: My Attempt at Blogging
text:
My Attempt at Blogging
Iâ€™ve wanted to start blogging since high school, but I always struggled with coming up with content. Even in university, I found myself wanting to write but not knowing what to write about.
Now, Iâ€™m making my nth attempt at consistent writing and have named my blog Carâ€™Log[n] (short for â€œCarlesâ€™ Log index nâ€). My hope is to write something that can be useful to others.
This blog is inspired by Lilian Wengâ€™s blog (which you can find here). While Iâ€™m not using Hago and Paper Mod like she does, I am using Quarto as my content management system. Iâ€™ve tried to make my blog as similar as possible to hers (although it wonâ€™t be 100% the same).
I chose Quarto because I used it in my Sains-Data-2023 and PDNum-2023 laboratory classes earlier this year.
I hope to be consistent in my writing.
Carles Octavianus
